header.name: Brendon Harrisson Avelino
header.bio: Full Stack Developer focused on responsive web solutions. Experienced with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and Node.js. Looking for freelance opportunities to grow and build high-level projects.

about.title: About Me
about.text1: I have hands-on experience in building websites, responsive landing pages, and API integration. I‚Äôve collaborated on full team projects.
about.text2: Although I haven't formally worked in companies yet, I redesigned the SESI website and developed the institutional site for Augebit during my technical course at SENAI.
about.text3: I also use Figma as a design tool to sketch layouts and interfaces, ensuring well-planned and attractive projects.

list.title: SESI Website Redesign
list.desc: Collaborative project focused on redesigning the interface and structure of SESI's electronic diary system.

list.title: Weather Forecast App
list.desc: Simple app using the Weather API to display weather data.

list.title: Requinte Churrasqueiras
list.desc: Reconstruction of Requinte's institutional website focused on barbecue products.
